author: Inside Edition
description: A 76-year-old woman was arrested and charged with assault with a weapon after firing a flare gun at her neighbor.
title: Flare Gun Attack Caught on Camera #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: Actress Denise Richards' estranged husband Aaron Phyphers showed Inside Edition the shocking conditions at their rented home in California. Richards and Phyphers are battling in an explosive divorce case. Richards claims Phyphers has "severely damaged" the property. Phyphers claims his family are the only ones caring for the house and Richard's several dogs. Richards alleged Phyphers "physically abused" her. He denies that and says she's making it up, because he filed for divorce.
title: Exclusive Look Inside Denise Richards’ House of Squalor

author: Inside Edition
description: The person of interest in the assassination of Charlie Kirk apparently attempted to hide his identity under a baseball cap and dark glasses. His shirt was emblazoned with the stars and stripes and the slogan "Land of the free, home of the brave." According to reports, the shooter's motive appears to be political since bullets were found engraved with "expressions of transgender and anti-fascist ideology." Authorities are still searching for the assassin.
title: Who is the Person of Interest in Assassination of Charlie Kirk?

author: Inside Edition
description: Sergeant Michael Lazarine raced to the scene of a choking 2-year-old at a Taco Bell. Little Addie was choking on her favorite toy, a tiny plastic octopus modeled after the character Pearl from the movie "Finding Nemo." It took Sergeant Lazarine 23 seconds to make it to the scene and save Addie's life. Inside Edition met the hero sergeant, who had just recently gotten a refresher on the child Heimlich maneuver.
title: Hero Sergeant Saves Choking 2-Year-Old 23 Seconds After 911 Call

author: Inside Edition
description: Charlie Kirk was married with two young children. His wife Erika is a former beauty queen who represented Arizona in the Miss USA pageant in 2012. Erika was a cheerleader for her husband. Kirk and his wife were active on social media but were careful not to show the faces of their kids and they never shared their names in the media. Kirk was gunned down at a Utah university campus during his "Prove Me Wrong" college tour where he was challenged by students who disagreed with him.
title: Charlie Kirk Leaves Behind Wife and 2 Young Children

author: Inside Edition
description: The manhunt continues for the person responsible for killing conservative political activist Charlie Kirk. Kirk was speaking at an event at Orem's Utah Valley University on Wednesday when he was struck in the neck by a bullet.
title: Search Continues for Charlie Kirk's Killer #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: This event had everything, pomp, pageantry, and prison bars. The Buen Pastor prison in Bogota, Colombia, held its 7th annual Miss Congeniality Pageant, featuring 16 inmates competing for the title. While there was plenty of time before the show to perfect their hair, makeup, and wardrobe, these women weren't actually judged on their appearance. Officials say the pageant is meant to promote values like compassion, solidarity, and respect. Inside Edition Digital’s Mara Montalbano has more.
title: Prison Holds Miss Congeniality Pageant to Promote Positive Values Among Inmates

author: Inside Edition
description: Pittsburgh Pirates fan Kavan Markwood spoke exclusively to Inside Edition’s Steven Fabian about his harrowing fall from the bleachers onto the field.
title: Baseball Fan Who Fell Onto Field Speaks Out #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: It's giving Myth of Sisyphus vibes.
title: Stubborn Cat Tries to Walk Up Descending Escalator #shorts

author: Inside Edition
description: The manhunt continues for the person responsible for killing conservative political activist Charlie Kirk. Kirk was speaking at an event at Orem's Utah Valley University on Wednesday afternoon when he was struck in the neck by a bullet. Utah authorities believe the shooter fired from 200 meters away. As the gathered crowd fled, Kirk was rushed to a hospital, where he was later pronounced dead. No suspect has been identified in Kirk’s death. The FBI is assisting with the investigation.
title: Manhunt Continues for Charlie Kirk's Killer

author: Inside Edition
description: A bride and her dad were about to do the traditional father/daughter dance when a video of them dancing to Beauty and the Beast more than 28 years ago appeared on a giant screen. Brittany Bertoul discovered the precious home video a decade ago. She was just 3 years old in the video. Brittany and her dad, Giorgio, recreated their special dance all these years later.  The father/daughter re-do is going viral.
title: Bride and Father Recreate Special Moment 28 Years Later

author: Inside Edition
description: There is growing outrage over the brutal killing of a 23-year-old Ukrainian refugee on a commuter train.
title: Surveillance Video Shows Fatal Train Attack #shorts
